author: Caroline Preston, The Hechinger Report
title: 'I hate COVID-19': Kids with disabilities struggle to adjust as schools close
description: Children who receive special education services because of their disabilities are particularly vulnerable as schools shut down and turn to remote learning as the coronavirus spreads.
content:
JoAnna Van Brusselen with her 11-year-old daughter, Iolani.JoAnna Van Brusselen
Children who receive special education services because of their disabilities are particularly vulnerable as schools shut down and turn to remote learning, experts say.
